snippet: George Wright will seek to prevent the United States from extraditing him by claiming Portuguese citizenship.
lead_paragraph: George Wright will seek to prevent the United States from extraditing him by claiming Portuguese citizenship.

headline.main: Fugitive Hopes New Identity Will Block Extradition
headline.print_headline: Fugitive Hopes New Identity Will Block Extradition
headline.seo: George Wright, Fugitive, Hopes New Citizenship Blocks U.S. Extradition
